data.text: @buffaloon @Joycecurrier2 I guess he'll never play bodyguard for a president any more (see movie "Dave" - he was excellent in it)! But not to make light of this incident, it is another disgusting example of picking the wrong people to be in a law enforcement position & poorly trained, poorly managed.
@buffaloon One requirement for being a  cop should be the ability to ask questions about the current situations and listen to answers and not be judge and jury! JustSaying
